Hello, I wanted to upload our 2022 rapid react limelight profile to people who want it
https://github.com/f873/Team-1188s-Limelight-Profile

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":16,"updated_at":"2022-04-04T19:48:43.090Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":109,"reads":376,"readers_count":375,"score":695.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":407856,"topic_slug":"team-1188s-2022-limelight-profile","display_username":null,"primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://github.com/f873/Team-1188s-Limelight-Profile","internal":false,"reflection":false,"clicks":147}],"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":5}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":52146,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/team-1188s-2022-limelight-profile/407856/1","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":6}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":5,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3037085,"name":"Dkt01","username":"Dkt01","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/dkt01/{size}/4603_2.png","created_at":"2022-04-04T21:04:00.283Z","cooked":"

How consistent has this been for you? Our pipeline is significantly different and we’ve run it without issues in two regional arenas (cool stage lighting at CIR, warm stage lighting at STL) and our practice facility (flourescent). At both regionals we aimed the camera around during field calibration and never saw interference. Our LimeLight 2+ pipeline is below as another reference.

Argos 1756 2022 LimeLight Pipeline 
area_max:10.262796673600004
area_min:0.0016777216000000003
area_similarity:0

aspect_min:0.3001249999999999

y_outlier_miqr:1.3
","post_number":2,"post_type":1,"posts_count":16,"updated_at":"2022-04-04T21:08:03.634Z","reply_count":2,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":25,"reads":329,"readers_count":328,"score":200.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":407856,"topic_slug":"team-1188s-2022-limelight-profile","display_username":"Dkt01","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":13396,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"1756 Argos: Programming Mentor"},"post_url":"/t/team-1188s-2022-limelight-profile/407856/2","custom_user_title":"1756 Argos: Programming Mentor","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3037111,"name":null,"username":"anon79490742","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/a/c0e974/{size}.png","created_at":"2022-04-04T21:38:48.724Z","cooked":"

Overall this limelight profile has worked great, and we have amazing accuracy, However the FIM district events are played in high schools with bright lights. So it wouldn’t be an issue at all if played under cool lights, because I won’t have the risk of tracking the lights at all, because if works great under very tough lighting conditions.

Tip for those of you using Limelight in arenas with overhead lights like these:

Houzz

High Bay Pendant, Polish Aluminum - Beach Style - Pendant Lighting - by...

Buy the High bay pendant, polish aluminum online from Houzz today, or shop for other Pendant Lighting for sale. Get user reviews on all Lighting products.

Max out your red balance. This shifts the entire image towards red, but the retro-reflective tape stays quite green. It drastically helps filter out white lights. You may need to adjust your HSV filtering a bit after you make this change.

We’re looking to configure our limelight pipeline tomorrow. Is it as simple as copying this? Copying with minor adjustments? or completely starting from scratch?
